name: Crystal Queens
description:
Stay in the middle and do not tough the fire ring.

After collecting all the yellow crystals collect the red and cyan crystals.
Last collect the green crystal.

Theme: Krass Jam 2
1) An artsy game where you hide from the economy and gravity doesn't exist.
2) An MMO where you must obtain collectible queens in the darkest caves.
3) An MMO where you slay princes and princesses with magic.

Interpretation:
Your ship is in space so the controls reflect that fact.
Destroy the drone ships that protect the monarchy to collect the power crystals.  The ultimate power crystal the green crystal will drop from the queen ship.  But first you must collect the supporting crystals from the prince and princess, the red and cyan crystals.
